name: Not Your Average Hero
description:
Controls:

WASD  =   Move

Space  = Place Shield 

Esc  =  Back to Menu

Goal:

The goal in Not Your Average Hero is to lead the enemy to the end of the level, protecting him from traps as you go. Place shields using space to block the enemy or projectiles. If the Enemy gets damaged or the player's health reaches 0 you die and the level restarts. Good Luck!

This game was made for the first Brackeys Jam Community Community Jam, and is my first dive into level design.

Level 3 has never been beaten (even by me) the first person to beat it gets my eternal respect

EDIT: Level three has been beaten by JUSTCAMH WITHOUT DAMAGE so he gets my eternal respect times two as well as a free copy of the game
